title: error while installing
body: so i deleted the game off my old computer because  build ed  a new one after i installed  the new client.the game was on 36% then error for patching then goes back to 0% WTF

replies.body:
If the patcher runs into any errors trying to scan or download the new files, it will need to restart to make sure that none of the files were corrupted. If the patcher keeps throwing this error over and over, we may need to look into your network to see what's preventing it from downloading correctly.

Check out this [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can get to the bottom of why your patcher can't finish.
i did all that but it still says  error while patching

There might be something entirely different blocking that connection or preventing the patcher from doing it's thing. Go ahead and reach out to our tech guys through a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and they'll be able to dig much deeper.
